extension.name: sh404sef - System mobile template switcher
extension.author: Yannick Gaultier
extension.description: Switch site template for mobile devices

field.name: mobile_switch_enabled
field.label: Enable template switcher
field.description: If yes, site template will be set to the template listed below for requests identified by Joomla as coming from a mobile device

field.name: mobile_template
field.label: Switch to template
field.description: The site template to switch to when a mobile device request is detected
